name: Best Cauliflower Soup
author: Nancy Carreiro
summary: This soup is the best comfort food for a cold day and freezes well without the milk. Try cream in place of milk for a thicker soup.
ingredients: 2  carrots, sliced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring chicken broth, cauliflower, potatoes, onion, carrots, salt, and pepper to a boil in a stockpot; reduce heat, cover pot with a lid, and simmer until vegetables are tender, 20 to 25 minutes
Mash vegetables using a potato masher or puree in a blender
Return pot to low heat and stir in milk
Cook soup until heated through, 3 to 5 more minutes
